PRAYER: Writ Petition is filed under Article 226 of the Constitution of
India to issue a Writ of Mandamus, directing the 1 st respondent to issue
passport to the petitioner with regard to the File No. MD207286883319 on
the file of the 1 st respondent within the time stipulated by this Court.
